entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump Only that??  How about you start testing for the Coronavirus?  How about you start telling the truth? The market crashed (since that is all you are worried about) because people are afraid of your massive incompetence. Get the fuck out of the White House NOW.
